law.catch_line: With the approval of the Governor, the Secretary shall appoint a director of the Division....

section.section: With the approval of the Governor, the Secretary shall appoint a director of the Division.
The director serves at the pleasure of the Secretary.
Removal of the director by the Secretary is final.

text.section: The director shall have demonstrated interest and experience in tourism, film, and the arts.
The director shall operate the Division under the direction of the Secretary.
